definition[0]: if an animal or plant reproduces, or reproduces itself, it produces young plants or animals
example[0]: The turtles return to the coast to reproduce.
definition[1]: to make a photograph or printed copy of something
example[1]: Klimt’s artwork is reproduced in this exquisite book.
definition[2]: to make something happen in the same way as it happened before
example[2]: British scientists have so far been unable to reproduce these results.
definition[3]: to make something that is just like something else
example[3]: With a good set of speakers, you can reproduce the orchestra’s sound in your own home.
